QuestData.Title: Last Steps
QuestData.Description: In a rage, Ga'nar ascended to fight Gorr'thog, the ogre king.$b$bHe is alone, and the ramp to the throne room is now blocked.$b$bYou've proven resourceful. Perhaps you could find another way up?$b$bI sustained wounds on my way here, but I will work to cut my way through and up the ramp so we may rejoin.$b$bHurry traveler, ensure that the Frostwolf clan wins our assault on the citadel.
QuestData.LogDescription: Climb the chain and kill Gorr'thog.
QuestData.RewardText: We called you outsider, $r, but you have shown the strength and heart of a Frostwolf.
